attributes.title: [covid-19] Description
attributes.visState:
{"title":"[covid-19] Description","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"**Welcome** to the visualization of the Covid-19 virus in Slovakia. This is my own initiative to showcase the data using Elastic Stack. This is by no means an official source of the information. You can find the almost complete setup with [source code](https://github.com/radoondas/covid-19-slovakia) in the link. 

Note on the dataset: There is no official complete machine-readable data set If you wish to improve the data please, create an [Issue](https://github.com/radoondas/covid-19-slovakia/issues) or [PR](https://github.com/radoondas/covid-19-slovakia/pulls) in the Github repository. Thank you and stay safe!

For official info look into the following links:
- [Official info](https://www.korona.gov.sk/)
- [Úrad verejného zdravotníctva Slovenskej republiky](http://www.uvzsr.sk/)"},"aggs":[]}
